Text:
I opted for a smaller file size to check out this film. Maybe it is the length of the movie. I'm not really sure. I don't think I can watch this. It's all too blurry for me and I have a 17" screen. 

Thanks for sharing. This would probably look great on a small media player.

Sharing is caring! Thanks!

After downloading a larger file -- http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5279548/  --It appears that this is the DVD and not the rip. It's just not that sharp.

My apologies.
